data.message: Dear Facebook, it would be nice if our Profile Photo didn't block out part of our Cover Photo. Like maybe placing it further down... Thanks :)

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Maria! We're constantly working to make our products better. We'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo. -Sarah

I have one, how about having real life people review the reports instead of your robots. Extremely sad to get the same form letter about violence against a baby not breaking community standards. Maybe program it tor recognize weapons instead of just a set of boobs?

Yes...move the profile pic down and get all text and elements out of the cover pic you will have the space when you move profile pic down. I stopped changing the cover pic when you moved the text in it and it seems like many others did.
